intro: Nephroia elegans, commonly known as the elegant nephroia, is a flowering plant native to the mountainous regions of South America. It belongs to the family Malvaceae, which includes hibiscus and cotton. The plant is characterized by its delicate, palmate leaves and showy, pale pink to white flowers that bloom in spring. It thrives in moist, well-drained soils and requires partial to full sunlight. Nephroia elegans is often cultivated for its ornamental value and is relatively easy to care for in suitable climates.
